Specify the particular inhalant: When possible, the particular sub-
stance involved should be named (e.g., “solvent use disorder”).
Specify if:
In early remission: After full criteria for inhalant use disorder
were previously met, none of the criteria for inhalant use disorder
have been met for at least 3 months but for less than 12 months
